00020 #ifndef RDK2_SESSION_EXCEPTIONS
00021 #define RDK2_SESSION_EXCEPTIONS
00022 
00023 #include <exception>
00024 #include <stdexcept>
00025 
00026 /*
00027  * This file is a duplicate of ../repository/session.h

00029  * Please refer to that for doxygen comments.

00032 #define DECLARE_EXCEPTION(SUB, SUPER) \
00033     struct SUB: public SUPER { \
00034         explicit SUB(const std::string&e):SUPER(e) { } \
00035 }; 
00036 
00037 namespace RDK2 { namespace RepositoryNS {
00038 
00039     DECLARE_EXCEPTION(SessionException, std::runtime_error);
00040     DECLARE_EXCEPTION(NoSuchProperty,   SessionException);
00041     DECLARE_EXCEPTION(ValueNotSet,      SessionException);
00042     DECLARE_EXCEPTION(WrongType,        SessionException);
00043     DECLARE_EXCEPTION(InvalidOperation, SessionException);
00044     DECLARE_EXCEPTION(MalformedUrlException, SessionException);
00045 
00046 }} // namespaces
